april.jmat
Class CSRVec

java.lang.Object
  april.jmat.Vec
      april.jmat.CSRVec

public class CSRVec
extends Vec

Sparse vector implementation using a column-sorted row.

transposeAsColumn

public final void transposeAsColumn(Matrix A,
                                    int col)
Description copied from class: Vec
Insert this vector as column 'col' in matrix A. The column is initially all zero. The vector should iterate through its elements, calling the matrix's set method.
